card.termsAndConditionsPreDisclaimer: We want you to know exactly how the SORA card service will work, who needs your details and why. Reviewing these policies will help you use the app with peace of mind.
card.disclaimerCollectData: The SORA community does not collect any personal data, to get the SORA Card and IBAN account you will need to complete a KYC process directly with the card issuer.
card.termsAndConditionsWarning: By continuing you confirm that you have read, understood and accepted these policies

guideline.photoTitle: Submit a photo of your ID document
guideline.photoDesc: Passport, Driver License, ID card or Residence Permit
guideline.selfieDesc: The guidance will be provided during the process
guideline.proofAddressTitle: Submit a photo of proof of address
guideline.proofAddressDesc: An official document (utility bill, bank statement, government statement or correspondence) that contains your full name and address, and that is no older then 3 months.
guideline.personalDesc: Fill in the form with your name and address
guideline.proofAddressNote: Note: Statements from neobanks like Revolut and N26 are currently not seen as valid proof of address.
guideline.paidAttemptDisclaimer: You have only {count} free attempts to pass the KYC process. Every other attempt after that will cost €{cost}. Paid attempts will be available after the next update of the app.

card.noSpamText: No spam! Only to secure your account
card.verificationCodeText: You will receive\na verification code via SMS
card.statusAcceptText: Your KYC verification is successful and we are already preparing to send you the SORA card!
card.freeStartDesc: {value} of XOR in your account for free start
card.phoneInputBeforeSendDesc: We’ll send you an SMS code.
card.phoneInputAfterSendDesc: We’ve sent you an SMS code. Check your messages!
card.infoMessageNoKYC: KYC process has not been finished.
card.emailInputBeforeSendDesc: We’ll send you a verification email.
card.emailInputAfterSendDesc: We’ve sent you the magic link. Check your email!
card.infoMessageTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please, try again
card.blacklistedCountriesExcuse: Unfortunately, at this moment we’re not able to support the following countries:
card.statusPendingText:
You have successfully completed your KYC application. The review is pending and you can expect a decision shortly.

Usually the decision is made the same day and in some cases can take up to 3 days.
card.statusRejectText: Your application has been rejected by internal audit, please check out our requirements and terms of service carefully before applying again
card.noFreeAttemptsDesc: You have used your free attempt to pass the KYC process. We kindly ask you to wait until the next upgrade of the application to proceed with paid attempts.
card.unsupportedCountriesDisclaimer: Residents from certain countries can not apply for SORA Card at this moment
card.userNotFound: No mobile number found, please recheck it and try again.
card.getSoraCardDesc: Get a Euro IBAN account and debit card accessible within your SORA Wallet
card.rejectionPriceAttemptDisclaimer: Every other attempt will cost you €{0}
card.rejectCount: You have {count} more free KYC attempt|You have {count} more free KYC attempts
card.emailSpamReminder: The email might take several minutes to arrive. Please verify your spam folder if you haven't received the email after 5 minutes.
card.gettingCardForFree: You’re getting the card for free!
card.holdSufficientXor: You hold €100 worth of XOR in your SORA account
card.holdNotSufficientXor: If you hold, stake or provide liquidity for at least €100 worth of XOR in your SORA account
card.xorAmountNeededTitle: You need {value} XOR to receive a free card
card.oneTimeApplicationFee: One-time fee to issue a card
card.applicationFeeNote: Note: paid card issuance will be available at a later stage.
card.statusRejectReasonMultiple: Your application has been rejected for multiple reasons:
card.filterCountries: Filter by Country or Dial code
card.ibanPendingDesc:
Your IBAN issuance is pending.
In case the wait longer than 72h contact us via {email}
